title: Feminist Movie Friday: Jennifer's Body
itunes:title: Feminist Movie Friday: Jennifer's Body
description:
It's Friday the 13th, so we're talking about the cult classic Jennifer's Body, the sexist marketing that did it wrong, so many feminist themes, and why it resonates during the time of #MeToo.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
